title: Mexico and Nigeria courts both judicial review

content.question: Which of the following statements concerning Mexican and Nigerian politics is most accurate?

choices.label: The bureaucracies in Nigeria and Mexico must both reflect the countriesâ€™ federal characters.
Supreme courts in both countries can exercise judicial review.
Both the Nigerian and Mexican presidents are limited to two terms.
Party affiliation in both Mexico and Nigeria is strongly correlated with income levels.
Only Mexico has a bicameral legislature.

content.answer: Supreme courts in both countries can exercise judicial review.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
